trans-unit.source: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de localização baseados em coordenadas de latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> classe fornece dados baseados em coordenadas de local do provedor de local atual.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: O provedor do local atual é priorizado como o mais alto no computador, com base em uma série de fatores, como a idade e a precisão dos dados de todos os provedores, a precisão solicitada por aplicativos de local e o impacto de desempenho e o consumo de energia associado ao provedor local.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: O provedor do local atual pode ser alterado ao longo do tempo, por exemplo, quando um dispositivo GPS perde o sinal de satélite em locais fechados e um provedor de triangulação Wi-Fi torna-se o provedor mais preciso no computador.

trans-unit.source: To begin accessing location data, create a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> and call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> or <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Para começar a acessar os dados de local, crie um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> e chame <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> ou <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> para iniciar a aquisição de dados do provedor de local atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property can be checked to determine if data is available.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade pode ser verificada para determinar se os dados estão disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: If data is available, you can get the location one time from the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se houver dados disponíveis, você pode obter o local de uma vez a partir de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> propriedade, ou receber atualizações contínua local manipulando o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> properties support <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, so that an application can data-bind to these properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> suporte para propriedades de <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, de modo que um aplicativo pode associação de dados para essas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: In Windows 7, all the <xref:System.Device.Location> classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location.
trans-unit.target: No Windows 7, todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> classes são totalmente funcional se o provedor local está instalado e capaz de resolver o local do computador.

trans-unit.source: On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: No Windows 7 Starter Edition, o provedor somente local com suporte é o provedor de local padrão no painel de controle e um suplemento deve ser instalado para especificar a latitude e longitude.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: **Observação** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, as seguintes condições se aplicam:

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade sempre terá o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: O local indicado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> sempre será <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento local será gerado.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to create a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> and start acquiring data by using an initialization timeout.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> e iniciar a obtenção de dados usando um tempo limite de inicialização.

trans-unit.source: The code then prints the coordinates of the location, if known.
trans-unit.target: O código, em seguida, imprime as coordenadas do local, se conhecido.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to receive continuous location updates by subscribing to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir mostra como receber atualizações contínua local assinando <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: **Observação** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, as seguintes condições se aplicam:

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade sempre terá o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: O local indicado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> sempre será <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento local será gerado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> with default accuracy settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> com configurações de precisão padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default accuracy setting is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy.Default>.
trans-unit.target: A configuração de precisão padrão é <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy.Default>.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: **Observação** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, as seguintes condições se aplicam:

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade sempre terá o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: O local indicado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> sempre será <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento local será gerado.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy" /> that indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy" /> que indica o nível de precisão solicitado do localizador.

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy.High" /> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: Uma precisão de <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy.High" /> pode prejudicar o desempenho e deve ser especificada somente quando a alta precisão for necessária.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />, given an accuracy level.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />, dado um nível de precisão.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: **Observação** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, as seguintes condições se aplicam:

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade sempre terá o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: O local indicado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> sempre será <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento local será gerado.

trans-unit.source: The requested accuracy level for the location data that is provided by the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: O nível de precisão solicitado para os dados de localização fornecidos pelo <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy" />, which indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy" />, o que indica o nível de precisão solicitado do localizador.

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy.High> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: Uma precisão de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy.High> pode prejudicar o desempenho e deve ser especificada somente quando a alta precisão for necessária.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: **Observação** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, as seguintes condições se aplicam:

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade sempre terá o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: O local indicado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> sempre será <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento local será gerado.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pela instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método deve ser chamado para que os recursos não gerenciados podem ser liberados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pela instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método deve ser chamado para que os recursos não gerenciados podem ser liberados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pela instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método deve ser chamado para que os recursos não gerenciados podem ser liberados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Libera recursos e executa outras operações de limpeza antes que o <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> seja reivindicado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> event, before the location provider raises another <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: A distância que deve ser percorrida, em metros, em relação à coordenada do último evento <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> antes que o localizador gere outro evento <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Distance, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Distância em metros.

trans-unit.source: The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event and an update in the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O limite de movimento padrão é zero, o que significa que qualquer alteração no local detectado pelas causas de provedor do local atual um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> eventos e uma atualização no <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: O limite de movimentação não garante que os eventos serão recebidos no limite solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: A plataforma tenta cumprir as solicitações para um limite específico de movimentação, mas em alguns casos, os eventos não serão gerados no limite solicitado.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply:
trans-unit.target: **Observação** nas versões do Windows anterior ao Windows 7, as seguintes condições se aplicam:

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Device.Location> objetos que tenham construtores podem ser criados, mas o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade sempre terá o valor <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: O local indicado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> sempre será <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum evento local será gerado.

trans-unit.source: The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer.
trans-unit.target: O diagrama a seguir representa as coordenadas de local que o provedor de local (por exemplo, um dispositivo GPS) fornece ao computador.

trans-unit.source: P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold.
trans-unit.target: P1, no diagrama, representa os dados de local incluídos em um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> de eventos e P2, P3 e P4 representam pontos dentro do limite de movimentação.

trans-unit.source: So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events are raised, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> returns P1.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, quando o provedor local fornece dados indicando um local que os pontos (P1, P2, P3 e P4), não <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> os eventos são gerados, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> retorna P1.

trans-unit.source: The point P5 is outside of the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A> distance, so at that point, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> is updated and a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O P5 ponto está fora do <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A> distância, portanto nesse ponto, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> é atualizado e um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama ilustrando MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagrama ilustrando MovementThreshold")

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs`1" /> object that contains the new location.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs`1" /> que contém a nova localização.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um evento <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to subscribe to continuous updates from <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: O programa a seguir mostra como se inscrever para atualizações contínuas de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs" /> object that contains the new status.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs" /> que contém o novo status.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um evento <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged" /> ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade que foi modificada.

trans-unit.source: Called when a property of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma propriedade de <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> event to implement data binding in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> evento para implementar a associação de dados em aplicativos de formulários do Windows.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property, or the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica que o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> propriedade, ou o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> propriedade foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether permission to access location data from location providers has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a permissão para acessar dados de localização de provedores locais foi concedida ou negada.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether permission has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se permissão foi concedida ou negada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> que indica o local atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> que indica o local atual.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property is saved in a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> object.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> propriedade é salvo em um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude fields of the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> are printed if they are known.
trans-unit.target: Os campos de latitude e longitude do <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> são impressas se eles são conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the latitude or longitude of the location data has changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a latitude ou a longitude dos dados de localização foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado apenas quando a distância movido desde o último evento excede o limite especificado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> object passed to the event handler includes the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> object that contains the updated location data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> objeto passado para o manipulador de eventos inclui o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> objeto que contém os dados de local atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the first <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como tratar o primeiro <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicie a aquisição de dados do localizador atual.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> events and allows access to the <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse método habilita eventos <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> e permite o acesso à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position" />.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicie a aquisição de dados do localizador atual.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> events and allows access to the <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse método habilita eventos <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> e permite o acesso à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método iniciará a aquisição de dados do provedor de local atual.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: O provedor do local atual é selecionado com base em fatores como a idade e a precisão dos dados de todos os provedores, a precisão solicitada pelo aplicativo ou aplicativos e o consumo de energia e impacto de desempenho associada ao provedor local.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: O provedor do local atual pode ser alterado ao longo do tempo, por exemplo, quando um dispositivo GPS perde o sinal de satélite em locais fechados e um provedor de triangulação Wi-Fi torna-se o provedor mais preciso no computador.

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> method is called, it will start to acquire data.
trans-unit.target: Se o atual priorizadas provedor local não tem dados quando o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> método é chamado, ele será iniciado para obter dados.

trans-unit.source: If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Se as permissões tiverem sido concedidas ao cliente quando os dados se torna disponíveis, dados podem ser acessados de forma síncrona e serão entregues de forma assíncrona se os eventos estão sendo tratados.

trans-unit.source: If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> is called, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> will immediately return, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events will not be raised, and the location returned by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will contain <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Se a plataforma de Sensor do Windows 7 e o local é desabilitada quando <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> é chamado, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> retornará imediatamente, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> eventos não serão gerados e o local retornado pelo <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> propriedade de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> conterá <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Se o provedor local priorizada atual tiver dados, ele estará disponível imediatamente sincronicamente e serão entregues de forma assíncrona se os eventos estão sendo tratados.

trans-unit.source: If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission.
trans-unit.target: Se o aplicativo de chamada não tem permissões para acessar dados de um provedor de local, o usuário será solicitado com uma caixa de diálogo para conceder ou negar permissão.

trans-unit.source: The dialog box will be modeless.
trans-unit.target: A caixa de diálogo será sem janela restrita.

trans-unit.source: The following program handles the first location update that occurs after <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte programa trata a primeira atualização local depois <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to suppress the permission dialog box; <see langword="false" /> to optionally show the permission dialog box if permissions have not already been granted.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para suprimir a caixa de diálogo de permissão; <see langword="false" /> para mostrar opcionalmente a caixa de diálogo de permissão, caso as permissões ainda não tenham sido concedidas.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicie a aquisição de dados do localizador atual.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> events and allows access to the <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse método habilita eventos <see cref="E:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged" /> e permite o acesso à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current status of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o status atual do <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus" /> which indicates the availability of data from the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus" /> que indica a disponibilidade de dados do <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged> events and prints a message based on the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir trata <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged> eventos e imprime uma mensagem com base no <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the status of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> object has changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o status do objeto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged> event is raised on the same thread that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> object was created on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged> evento é gerado no mesmo thread que o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> objeto foi criado no.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to handle <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como tratar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Stops the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" /> from providing location data and events.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o fornecimento de dados de localização e eventos pelo <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Stop%2A> is called, no further <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events occur, and the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property will return <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Stop%2A> é chamado, nenhum outro <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> eventos ocorrem e o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> propriedade retornará <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Stop%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Stop%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus.Disabled>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to suppress the permission dialog box; <see langword="false" /> to display the permission dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para suprimir a caixa de diálogo de permissão; <see langword="false" /> para exibir a caixa de diálogo de permissão.

trans-unit.source: Time in milliseconds to wait for the location provider to start before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Tempo em milissegundos para aguardar o localizador do Windows iniciar antes do tempo limite ser excedido.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a aquisição de dados do localizador atual.

trans-unit.source: This method returns synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é retornado de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data acquisition is started within the time period specified by <paramref name="timeout" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a aquisição de dados iniciar dentro do período de tempo especificado por <paramref name="timeout" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks execution of the calling thread during the time period specified by `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método bloqueia a execução do thread de chamada durante o período de tempo especificado por `timeout`.

trans-unit.source: Use caution when calling <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> from the user interface thread of your application.
trans-unit.target: Tenha cuidado ao chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> do thread da interface do usuário do seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A>.
